rule-21-1-a.test_description: Baseline RMR is modeled with purchased HW, same as proposed RMR

standard.rule_description: For purchased HW/steam in Proposed, the baseline shall also be modeled with Pursches HW/steam
standard.rule_dependency: Proposed is modeled with purchased HW/steam

rule-21-1-b.test_description: Baseline RMR is not modeled with purchased HW

standard.rule_description: For purchased HW/steam in Proposed, the baseline shall also be modeled with Pursches HW/steam
standard.rule_dependency: Proposed is modeled with purchased HW/steam

rule-21-2-a.test_description: Baseline RMR is modeled purchased HW and with same number of pumps as proposed

standard.rule_description: For purchased HW/steam in Proposed, the baseline shall have the same number of pumps as proposed
standard.rule_dependency: Proposed is modeled with purchased HW/steam

rule-21-2-b.test_description: Baseline RMR is modeled with purchased HW not modeled with same number of pumps as proposed

standard.rule_description: For purchased HW/steam in Proposed, the baseline shall have the same number of pumps as proposed
standard.rule_dependency: Proposed is modeled with purchased HW/steam

rule-21-3-a.test_description: Baseline RMR is modeled with a HW loop that is sized based on coincident loads

standard.rule_description: Plant sized based on coincident loads

rule-21-3-b.test_description: Baseline RMR is modeled with a HW loop that is not sized based on coincident loads

standard.rule_description: Plant sized based on coincident loads

rule-21-4-a.test_description: Baseline RMR has a HW Loop with a natural draft boiler

standard.rule_description: Boilers should be modeled if baseline system = 1,5,7,11,12 and should be of natural draft type.
standard.rule_dependency: Baseline number of HW Loops > 0 and number of boilers in HW loop >0

rule-21-4-b.test_description: Baseline RMR has a HW Loop with a natural draft boiler

standard.rule_description: Boilers should be modeled if baseline system = 1,5,7,11,12 and should be of natural draft type.
standard.rule_dependency: Baseline number of HW Loops > 0 and number of boilers in HW loop >0

rule-21-5-a.test_description: Baseline RMR has a HW Loop with a single boiler

standard.rule_description: For building area>15,000ft2, two equally sized boilers should be modeled. Else a single boiler should be modeled.
standard.rule_dependency: Baseline number of HW Loops > 0 and number of boilers in HW loop >1

rule-21-5-b.test_description: Baseline RMR has a HW Loop with a single boiler

standard.rule_description: For building area>15,000ft2, two equally sized boilers should be modeled. Else a single boiler should be modeled.
standard.rule_dependency: Baseline number of HW Loops > 0 and number of boilers in HW loop >1

rule-21-5-c.test_description: Baseline RMR has a HW Loop with a single boiler

standard.rule_description: For building area>15,000ft2, two equally sized boilers should be modeled. Else a single boiler should be modeled.
standard.rule_dependency: Baseline number of HW Loops > 0 and number of boilers in HW loop >1

rule-21-5-d.test_description: Baseline RMR has a HW Loop with a single boiler

standard.rule_description: For building area>15,000ft2, two equally sized boilers should be modeled. Else a single boiler should be modeled.
standard.rule_dependency: Baseline number of HW Loops > 0 and number of boilers in HW loop >1

rule-21-5-f.test_description: Baseline RMR has a HW Loop with two equally sized boilers

standard.rule_description: For building area>15,000ft2, two equally sized boilers should be modeled. Else a single boiler should be modeled.
standard.rule_dependency: Baseline number of HW Loops > 0 and number of boilers in HW loop >1

rule-21-5-g.test_description: Baseline RMR has a HW Loop with two equally sized boilers

standard.rule_description: For building area>15,000ft2, two equally sized boilers should be modeled. Else a single boiler should be modeled.
standard.rule_dependency: Baseline number of HW Loops > 0 and number of boilers in HW loop >1

rule-21-6-a.test_description: Baseline RMR has a HW Loop with two boilers staged based on load

standard.rule_description: For a baseline building with two boilers, each is staged based on Load.

rule-21-6-b.test_description: Baseline RMR has a HW Loop with two boilers staged based on load

standard.rule_description: For a baseline building with two boilers, each is staged based on Load.

rule-21-7-a.test_description: Baseline RMR has HW loop with Boiler, where HWST=180F and HWRT = 130F

standard.rule_description: HWST=180F, HSRT=130F

rule-21-7-b.test_description: Baseline RMR has HW loop with Boiler, where HWST=180F and HWRT = 130F

standard.rule_description: HWST=180F, HSRT=130F

rule-21-8-a.test_description: Baseline RMR has HW loop with Boiler, HWST is reset based on OAT (HWST=180F at 20F OA DryBylb, HWST=150F at 50F OA B=DryBulb, ramped linearly inbetween)

standard.rule_description: HWST reset using OA reset schedule. 180F at 20F OAT, 150Fat 50F OAT, ramped linerarly between 150F and 180F.

rule-21-8-b.test_description: Baseline RMR has HW loop with Boiler, HWST is reset based on OAT (HWST=180F at 20F OA DryBylb, HWST=150F at 50F OA B=DryBulb, ramped linearly inbetween)

standard.rule_description: HWST reset using OA reset schedule. 180F at 20F OAT, 150Fat 50F OAT, ramped linerarly between 150F and 180F.

rule-21-8-c.test_description: Baseline RMR has HW loop with Boiler, HWST is reset based on OAT (HWST=180F at 20F OA DryBylb, HWST=150F at 50F OA B=DryBulb, ramped linearly inbetween)

standard.rule_description: HWST reset using OA reset schedule. 180F at 20F OAT, 150Fat 50F OAT, ramped linerarly between 150F and 180F.

rule-21-9-a.test_description: Baseline RMR has HW loop with Boiler, HW Loop pump power = 19W/GPM

standard.rule_description: HW pump power = 19W/gpm

rule-21-9-b.test_description: Baseline RMR has HW loop with Boiler, HW Loop pump power = 19W/GPM

standard.rule_description: HW pump power = 19W/gpm

rule-21-9-c.test_description: Baseline RMR has HW loop with Boiler, HW Loop pump power = 19W/GPM

standard.rule_description: HW pump power = 19W/gpm

rule-21-10-a.test_description: Baseline RMR has HW loop with Boiler, HW Loop serves 12,000 ft2. Pump modeled as riding the pump curve

standard.rule_description:
Area serverd >=120,000 ft2, Pump is modeled with VSD
Area served <120.000 ft2, pump modeled as riding the pump curve.

rule-21-10-b.test_description: Baseline RMR has HW loop with Boiler, HW Loop serves 12,000 ft2. Pump modeled as riding the pump curve

standard.rule_description:
Area serverd >=120,000 ft2, Pump is modeled with VSD
Area served <120.000 ft2, pump modeled as riding the pump curve.

rule-21-10-c.test_description: Baseline RMR has HW loop with Boiler, HW Loop serves 150,000 ft2. Pump modeled as variable speed, variable flow

standard.rule_description:
Area serverd >=120,000 ft2, Pump is modeled with VSD
Area served <120.000 ft2, pump modeled as riding the pump curve.

rule-21-10-d.test_description: Baseline RMR has HW loop with Boiler, HW Loop serves 150,000 ft2. Pump modeled as riding the pump curve

standard.rule_description:
Area serverd >=120,000 ft2, Pump is modeled with VSD
Area served <120.000 ft2, pump modeled as riding the pump curve.
